remarks: Functionality of scalar sigma map.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Jun-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hgmapfn.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hgmapfn.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmapfn.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hgmapfn.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
hgmapfn.g $e |- G = ( ( HGMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmapfn.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hgmapfnN $p |- ( ph -> G Fn B ) $.
